page.title: 20The Nicky-Nack
page.content: {There are several stories of how the {Nicky-Nack got its name. This is one. One day, a man drove along the road with his horse and cart on his way from market. He saw an old lady and stopped to give her a lift. As they rode along he heard a strange noise --- 'nickety-nack, nickety nack' --- He turned around and saw that the old woman was really a man. He had a knife and was fingering it as they rode along, obviously up to no good. He thought that the man was going to murder him so he pushed him off the cart and rodeon quickly. But the noise continued. It was the noise of the horses shoes on the cobbled road outside of the inn. They went --- 'nickety-nack, nickety-nack' --- on the cobbles.
